helpAllFlag: Displaying one category per page. Have issues with the embed? Run `{{prefix}}help --all` for a full list in DMs.
helpDescription: Displays all commands or the description of one.

helpExtended.extendedHelp:
The help command shows a paginated list of all commands by their categories, or the extended information of a command if specified.

If you use `--categories` or `--cat`, you can get the list of all categories and the amount of commands each one of them have.
helpExtended.reminder: The help command **only** shows the commands you can use. For the full list, please visit <https://skyra.pw/commands>.

helpDm: ðŸ“¥ | The list of commands you have access to has been sent to your DMs.
helpNodm: {{REDCROSS}} | You have DMs disabled so I couldn't send you the list of commands.
infoBody:
[Birthdayy](https://birthdayy.xyz) {{VERSION}} is a multi-purpose Discord Bot designed for managing your birthdays.
I use the [Sapphire Framework](https://sapphirejs.dev) for the [Discord.js library](https://discord.js.org).

[Privacy Policy](https://birthdayy.xyz/disclosure).
